boardgame.name: Eurorails
boardgame.description: Eurorails is another entry in the Mayfair Games crayon rail games, like Empire Builder and India Rails. Its puzzle-piece board forms a map of Europe broken down into dots. Players use different-colored crayons to draw rail from dot to dot, building their rail system. A large deck of cards is used to determine how much money will be generated by picking up a particular commodity and delivering it to the listed city, with the payoffs being related to how far away the source is from the destination. As players generate more money, they build successively larger and more comprehensive rail systems, hopefully connecting to almost all the major cities. The goal of the game is to generate a set amount of money once you've linked all the major cities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1990 Origins Awards Best Modern-Day Boardgame Winner
boardgame.boardgameversion: Mayfair Gray box, Origins Award Winner 1993

listing.notes: Eurorailsâ€”The European Railroad Game. Based on the award winning Empire Builder railroad building game. Eurorails allows you to amass fortune and power by picking up commodities from cities that produce them and delivering them to cities that need them. The more efficient the rail lines you build, the larger your fortune becomes. Shrink wrapped and new. Game unplayed in mint condition. All decals on original stick sheet and cards in shrink, etc. Buyer pays exact ship.

New except box not shrinkwrapped. Original 1990 edition in small box. Box corners a little dinged but not badly. Also have used 1990 edition in good condition that could be bought for $15.00 Both are complete.
New except box not shrinkwrapped. Original 1990 edition in small box. Box corners a little dinged but not badly.

CONDITION: Like new, contents mint, unused and complete. The box has slight wear and a small ding to one corner. POSTAGE COST: UK postage: Â£5.50 European Postage: Â£10.50 Rest of World Postage: Â£21.00 Any buyers in and around London are welcome to collect in person (cash on collection). COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. ABOUT ME: I have been playing and collecting games for over 25 years and I also sell games and magazines on ebay with the same username (saabdastard) where I have a 100% positive rating and a feedback score of over 4000. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Please wait until you receive my invoice before sending payment. Payment is due within 5 days of the date you receive my invoice. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: UK buyers may use PayPal, cheque or cash-on-collection. Overseas buyers MUST USE PAYPAL only. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Europe and Rest of World rates shown above are for Airmail. Surface Mail rate to Rest of World is available if you wish (same as Europe Air rate), but Surface Mail to Rest of World can take up to 2 months! There is no real difference between Air and Surface rates for Europe. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Failure to take out optional insurance limits my liability for loss or damage in the mail to the amount automatically covered by Royal Mail (currently Â£39 per package for Small Packets, Â£150 for International Standard). CUSTOMS: Buyers outside the EU are responsible for all Customs charges applicable to their country. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange or refund within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization from me BEFORE returning the item.
Reserved for falloutfan.

Mayfair 1990 edition. Played but contents complete and in good condition except as noted: Board is clean of any crayon remnants but has a couple of very small marred parts in the unused blue ocean area. Crayons are intact, not worn past paper wrapping, except for yellow which has tip broken off. Box insert has some crayon staining around a couple of compartments. Box is structurally intact, with wearing along most edges, tape remnants once holding it shut, and price sticker. Otherwise, the actual game components are in good shape and very playable.

Mayfair Games (MFG 4507) Eurorails 4th Edition EPIC RAILROAD BUILDING IN EUROPE! Discover a modern European classic. Celebrate one of the world_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s most vital and enduring passions: railroads. Use your initial investment to build track. Then pick up commodities where they are grown, mined, or manufactured and deliver them to a lucrative place of demand. Complete a delivery and make the money you need to buy larger, faster trains, and expand your railroad empire. Win the game by building the most effective railroad empire! With over a million variations, Eurorails never grows old. You decide where to lay your tracks. Your only obstacles are rival tracks and Europe_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s great mountains, channels, and rivers. So, ignore the borders. Capture the industrial spirit of Europe and learn to build an empire. Whether you share Eurorails as an evening with friends or as a rainy day activity with your family, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll always find it captivating! After enjoying this great game, you can explore one of the many other award-winning Empire Builder games, including titles as diverse as China Rails, Australian Rails, and Martian Rails. Eurorails is geographically accurate. The game depicts Europe_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s rivers, plains, and mountains, as well as its natural resources. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a great way to learn about the geography, business, shipping, and transportation of Europe while having loads of fun with friends or family! Eurorails contains: . 1 markable gameboard (puzzle-cut map) . 2 decks of colorful cards (180 total) . 94 color load chips . 1 pack of money . 1 pack of crayons . 6 train pawns . full-color rules â€¢ Players: 2-6 â€¢ Ages: 12+ â€¢ Playing Time: 120-240 minutes â€¢ Designer: Mayfair Games â€¢ Art: Stefan Sierhej
UK parcel Â£4.60 UK 1st class Â£5.30 Europe Â£8.70 latest 4th Edition

KK Boardgames ~ supplier-direct games ~ your Canadian and US source for discount game prices based in Vancouver, BC and Blaine, WA. All prices in USD and all games are new and in shrink unless otherwise stated. For Canadian customers who want to pay in CAD, we can convert to CAD based on the current exchange rate. Eurorails - $33.60 Availability: DIRECT ORDER - In stock at our supplier. *** Usually ships in 1-2 weeks ***. If you place an order, we will include the game in our next order from our supplier* *Next order date - to see our next order date click on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link. If the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link is not visible, click on the user ID _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;kkrieger_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; to view our _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;geekstore_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;, then click on the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;More info..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; link for a specific game. SHIPPING: We are near the US/Canada border so we can ship from either country -- there are absolutely no customs fees for US and Canada orders! For Canadian orders, we ship with Canada Post and charge a flat rate for one game (based on your province, see below) + $1.50 for each additional game (up to a maximum of an additional $6). e.g. The 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th games ship for $1.50 each, all subsequent games ship for free. Metro Vancouver area $8.50 (1 business day) or $0.00* Victoria (South Vancouver Island) $10 (2 business days) BC $12 (2 business days) AB $13 (2 business days) SK $13 (3 business days) MB $14 (3 business days) ON $15 (4 business days) QC $15 (5 business days) PE,NB,NS $15 (7 business days) NL $17 (8 business days) YT $17 (5 business days) NU/NT/Remote areas $17 (up to 13 business days) *FREE local pick-up in Vancouver area. US Orders are shipped USPS from zipcode 98230. International Orders are shipped USPS Priority Mail International with insurance and return receipt. PROMOTIONS: Loyalty rewards: For every $50 of games on your order, receive a $2.50 credit to be used on a future order. PAYMENT METHODS: We accept the following forms of payment: 1. Interac e-Transfer* (Canadian banks) 2. Cash on delivery (local pick-up greater Vancouver area) 3. PayPal (Instant Transfer or debit/credit card funded) 4. Credit cards (processed by PayPal - your information is never shared with us) 5. Money Order - we will accept postal money orders, but will not ship games until money order is received and cashed. Our prices include a discount for paying cash or another no fee method (1-2 above). All payments processed by PayPal (3-4 above) will incur an extra charge of $0.30 + 2.9% to pass on the exact processing costs charged to us by PayPal. International payments through PayPal are $0.30 + 3.9%. We will provide detailed payment instructions for you once the order is placed. CONTACT US: Although we will make an effort to respond to all questions via geekmail as quickly as possible, your response time will be faster if you send questions via email to kkboardgames+bgg@gmail.com

[size=14][b][u]Comments:[/u][/b][/size] To see other titles that I have for sale (and perhaps mitigate shipping costs) enter the following into your browser: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/Paladin82Y . Note that I am not a store but just a gamer like you (although one that lost his mind and purchased waaaay too many games over the years). I have tried to accurately describe my offerings from a gamer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s perspective. If you are a collector or re-seller and need more details, just let me know. [size=14][b][u]Condition Notes:[/u][/b][/size] Smoke-free home. Played twice. In general, I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m mindful about the condition of my games while playing, but I am not a collector... I often discard advertisements and inserts. Box shows some shelfwear which includes whitening on edges and corners. Box has some discoloration (about the size of a dime -- might be from a price tag that was previously affixed?). Game components are complete and in excellent shape. Will include an extra copy of the Loads Available _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Symbols card, the Cities and Loads card, and the description of the Event cards (all of which are in the rules, but I printed out an extra copy). [b][u]Edition Notes:[/u][/b] English. [size=14][b][u]Shipping Notes:[/u][/b][/size] Ask me about how you can create an order where there will be no charge to ship this item as an add-on item if you purchase a big-box game at the same time. Note that this item is difficult (aka more expensive than normal) to ship because it is unusually large (even though it is NOT super heavy). I am willing to meet you at one of the many local Game Nights close to Waukee, IA (see https://www.boardgamegeek.com/guild/1365) to make the exchange in person which would reduce your shipping cost to $0.00. Otherwise--Yes, I will gladly combine orders to reduce your per-item shipping costs. (To see other items to add to your order see http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/Paladin82Y). When placing an order, please provide a contact phone number--this is ONLY in case there are shipping issues--I am NOT planning to call you. Also, please provide a direct/external (non-BGG) email address. Finally, if at all possible, please provide a business (rather than a residential) shipping address and let me know that the address you are providing is a business address (this may expedite delivery). [size=14][b][u]Payment Notes:[/u][/b][/size] **Note that the listed offered price includes a small discount for a cash (cash, money order, Amazon Gift Card, western union) payment. I cannot include the discount for payments made via Paypal. [b][i]US buyers:[/i][/b] When placing the order, let me know if you would like to purchase the optional insurance offered by the shipping company. I cannot remember ever having any material problems, but theoretically there is some risk. If the receiver (you) does NOT request (and does NOT pay extra for) insurance (decision is totally up to you) then the receiver (you) agrees to assume responsibility for lost or damaged packages. I know that this paragraph sounds scary, but my lawyer makes me include this -- again, this is probably a non-issue -- I have never had a package that I shipped go missing and think that I have had two people mention extremely minor blemishes incurred during shipping in the last 600 BGG items that I have shipped. See the [i][b]Info from Seller[/b][/i] Section below for more critically important details on payment options.
[b][i]non-US buyers:[/i][/b] See the [i][b]Info from Seller[/b][/i] Section below for more critically important details on shipping and payment options.
